name: TheFlipSide
description:
Team Name

Tatebug

Gameplay Instructions

Game Goal

Fight your way through all the enemies and find the puck.

Use the environment to your advantage! The enemy are deadly shots.

Your shield is capable of regening while you still have shield. Once they've broken it fully it won't come back.

Controls

WASD - Movement

LMouseButton - Shoot

RMouseButton - ADS

E - Interaction

SPACE - Jump

ESCAPE - Pause
